subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce had 36 points, 8 rebounds and 6 assists helped Boston extend its winning streak to 11 games with a 109-101 victory against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
snippet: Paul Pierce had 36 points, 8 rebounds and 6 assists helped Boston extend its winning streak to 11 games with a 109-101 victory against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
